name: Kyrie 5
description: A low-top basketball shoe designed for Kyrie Irving's quick first step and dynamic playing style. Features a breathable mesh upper, responsive cushioning, and a secure lockdown fit.

name: Nike LeBron
description: The signature shoe of LeBron James, offering maximum support, cushioning, and responsiveness for powerful athletes.

name: Nike PG Plaid
description: A comfortable and stylish basketball shoe featuring a plaid upper, perfect for on-court performance and off-court style.

name: Kyrie 8
description: Lightweight and responsive basketball shoe designed for Kyrie Irving's signature quick cuts and agility.
